summary: QuickStatsRow removal and Stats Header consolidation testing complete. All 16 tests passed. QuickStatsRow is no longer rendered on CommandCenterPage. All stats (Net Liquidation, Today's P&L, Positions, Market Regime) are now consolidated into the AI Trading Assistant header with a two-row layout. Bot controls (toggle, mode selector) work correctly in the bottom row.
passed_tests: TEST 1: QuickStatsRow is NOT rendered on the page
TEST 2: AI Command Panel exists with data-testid
TEST 3: Net Liquidation displays with data-testid='net-liquidation' (value: $0.00)
TEST 4: Today's P&L displays with data-testid='todays-pnl' (value: +$0.00)
TEST 5: Positions count displays with data-testid='positions-count' (value: 0)
TEST 6: Market Regime displays with data-testid='market-regime' (value: Loading...)
TEST 7: Bot toggle button found with data-testid='bot-toggle'
TEST 8: All mode selector buttons found (confirmation, auto, paused)
TEST 9: Two-row layout verified - top row has stats, bottom row has bot controls
TEST 10: Bot toggle button is clickable
TEST 11: All mode selector buttons are clickable
TEST 12: Found 24 SVG icons total, 4 icon containers in stats header
TEST 13: All stat labels present (Net Liq, Today P&L, Positions, Market)
TEST 14: P&L has color coding (green for positive values)
TEST 15: Market Regime has dynamic color styling
TEST 16: Panel height increased to h-[calc(100vh-200px)] min-h-[650px]
critical_code_review_comments: QuickStatsRow import and usage correctly removed from CommandCenterPage.js
StatsHeader component properly implements two-row layout with account stats on top and bot controls on bottom
All data-testid attributes correctly implemented: net-liquidation, todays-pnl, positions-count, market-regime, bot-toggle, mode-confirmation, mode-auto, mode-paused
AICoachTab correctly passes account, marketContext, positions props to AICommandPanel
Panel height correctly increased to h-[calc(100vh-200px)] min-h-[650px] since QuickStatsRow is removed
context_for_next_testing_agent: QuickStatsRow removed from CommandCenterPage. All stats consolidated into AI Trading Assistant header via StatsHeader component. Two-row layout: Top row shows Net Liq (DollarSign icon), Today P&L (TrendingUp/Down icon with green/red color), Positions (Briefcase icon), Market Regime (Activity icon with dynamic color). Bottom row shows Bot toggle and mode selector buttons (confirmation, auto, paused). Panel height increased to accommodate removed QuickStatsRow.

todays_pnl.color_coding: green for positive, red for negative
